content:
prs are failing due to :

curl: (56) OpenSSL SSL_read: Connection reset by peer, errno 54
clang+llvm-10.0.0-x86_64-apple-darwin/bin/modularize: Lzma library error:  No progress is possible
tar: Error exit delayed from previous errors.

https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/2466096395
https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/2466051272
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/84233 looks to be running fine so far, so probably just a spurious one that affected 2-3 prs
